description: EventPlanner is your ultimate destination for creating and participating in a wide variety of events, ranging from concerts to workshops and everything in between. Whether you are an event organizer or an attendee, EventPlanner provides you with the tools and platform to make your events a success.
create_events: Easily create events tailored to your needs and preferences.
discover_events: Explore a wide range of events happening in your area or online.
connect_others: Meet like-minded individuals and expand your network.
select_to_search: Select at least one search field to search for an event
plan_events: Plan your events with ease and style.
